title: What is DemandBase Application
content: Demandbase is a SaaS application that is focused on Account-Based Marketing (ABM) solutions to help businesses personalize their marketing efforts and engage with target accounts more effectively

title: What is Architecture of DemandBase
content: Demandbase would involve a combination of front-end and back-end components, databases, integrations, and other elements to support its features and services.

title: Escalation Point of contact POC for DemandBase Application
content: For technical issues, the escalation point of contact is Himani (Himani@abc.com). For customer service matters point of contact is Praveen (Praveen@abc.com) .

title: Support Point of contact POC for DemandBase Application
content: Praveen (praveen@abc.com) Can help you with general support question related to DemandBase Application

title: SME Subject Matter Expert for DemandBase Application
content: You can Contact Vikas Agarwal (vikas@abc.com) as he is the Subject Matter Expert (SME) for this application. He possesses in-depth knowledge and expertise and can provide valuable assistance regarding any inquiries or issues related to the application

title: What is Account Connector, How to access it of DemandBase Application
content: Using Account Connector, you can connect your Demandbase account data with other third-party integrations. Account Connector supports Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, Drift, Optimizely, Uberflip, and other custom integrations. To access the Account Connector page, from the left navigation bar, go to Settings_N.png Settings > Demandbase-Wide Settings > Account Connector See [Set Up Demandbase to Send Data to an Integration: Account Connector](https://support.demandbase.com/hc/en-us/articles/360057169531)

title: What data can Account Connecct send
content: Account Connector (API) can send account data only.

title: Who has access to Account Connector
Are there limits to the number of integrations you can create
content: There is no limit for the number integrations you can create

title: Are there limitations on the number of variables you can select for the response
